query:
-- Insert test scheduled posts for calendar
INSERT INTO posts (user_id, platform, tone, raw_input, generated_content, scheduled_for, status, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES 
  (1, 'linkedin', 'professional', 'Test post for calendar', 'This is a test LinkedIn post scheduled for tomorrow üöÄ', DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), 'scheduled', NOW(), NOW()),
  (1, 'twitter', 'casual', 'Test tweet', 'This is a test Twitter post scheduled for 3 days from now üê¶', DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 DAY), 'scheduled', NOW(), NOW()),
  (1, 'instagram', 'friendly', 'Test Instagram post', 'This is a test Instagram post scheduled for next week üì∏', DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), 'scheduled', NOW(), NOW()),
  (1, 'facebook', 'professional', 'Test Facebook post', 'This is a test Facebook post scheduled for 5 days from now üëç', DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 DAY), 'scheduled', NOW(), NOW());

-- Verify inserted posts
SELECT id, platform, scheduled_for, status FROM posts WHERE status = 'scheduled' ORDER BY scheduled_for;
